snippet: On the Lens blog, James Estrin spoke with Eric Thayer, who has been covering the Republican nominating contest almost nonstop since last July in Iowa, about the primary season.
abstract: On the Lens blog, James Estrin spoke with Eric Thayer, who has been covering the Republican nominating contest almost nonstop since last July in Iowa, about the primary season.

headline.main: On the Lens Blog: On the Bus, Away From the Pack
